property.name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.factor
property.description: The number of streams to merge at once while sorting files. This determines the number of open file handles.

property.name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.mb
property.description: The total amount of buffer memory to use while sorting files, in megabytes. By default, gives each merge stream 1MB, which should minimize seeks.

property.name: mapreduce.cluster.local.dir
property.description: The local directory where MapReduce stores intermediate data files. May be a comma-separated list of directories on different devices in order to spread disk i/o. Directories that do not exist are ignored.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.system.dir
property.description: The HDFS directory where MapReduce stores control files.

property.name: mapreduce.cluster.temp.dir
property.description: A shared HDFS directory for temporary files.

property.name: mapreduce.map.memory.mb
property.description: default memory requested for map task

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.memory.mb
property.description: default memory requested for reduce task

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.resource.mb
property.description: The amount of memory the MR AppMaster needs.

property.name: mapreduce.map.java.opts
property.description: Java opts for the map container process. Default heap allocated for map container is about 66% of default ${mapreduce.map.memory.mb}. These parameters can be changed on the client side according to actual resoure needs

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.java.opts
property.description: Java opts for the reduce container process. Default heap allocated for reduce container is about 80% of default ${mapreduce.reduce.memory.mb}. These parameters can be changed on the client side according to actual resoure needs

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.parallelcopies
property.description: The default number of parallel transfers run by reduce during the copy(shuffle) phase.

property.name: mapreduce.framework.name
property.description: The runtime framework for executing MapReduce jobs. Can be one of local, classic or yarn.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.intermediate-done-dir
property.description: Directory where history files are written by MapReduce jobs. Perms: 1777

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.done-dir
property.description: Directory where history files are moved when MR job is done and managed by the MR JobHistory Server. Perms: 750

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.webapp.address
property.description: MapReduce JobHistory Server Web UI host:port
